parameters.dialogText: "If you enjoy playing Throwy, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!"

parameters.text:
"fps: " & fps & newline & 

"cpu: " & round(cpuutilisation*100)& "%" & newline &
"gpu: " & round(gpuutilisation*100) & "%" &

newline&"memory: " & ImageMemoryUsage & "mb" &

newline &"obj count: " & objectcount

& newline & "---"

& newline & "Level " & LayoutName
